statements: SELECT * FROM segment_users;
SELECT user_name, email FROM segment_users;
SELECT user_id, interests, behavior_score FROM segment_users;
SELECT * FROM segment_users WHERE behavior_score > 80;
SELECT user_name, email, behavior_score FROM segment_users WHERE interests = 'music';
SELECT * FROM segment_users WHERE interests LIKE '%tech%' ORDER BY behavior_score DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_name, email FROM segment_users WHERE behavior_score > 50 AND interests IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, user_name, email FROM segment_users WHERE interests IN ('sports', 'music') ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, email, behavior_score FROM segment_users WHERE behavior_score BETWEEN 30 AND 70 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM segment_users WHERE interests LIKE '%tech%' OR interests LIKE '%art%' ORDER BY user_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM segment_users;
SELECT user_name, user_interests FROM segment_users;
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_interests FROM segment_users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT effort_id, strategy_name, effort_date FROM marketing_efforts WHERE strategy_name = 'Email Campaign';
SELECT * FROM marketing_efforts ORDER BY effort_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM segment_users WHERE user_interests = 'Music' ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT effort_id, strategy_name, effort_date FROM marketing_efforts WHERE user_id = 1001
SELECT * FROM marketing_efforts WHERE DATE(effort_date) = '2022-01-15' ORDER BY effort_id ASC
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_behaviors FROM segment_users WHERE user_behaviors LIKE '%shopping%'
SELECT user_id, user_name, effort_description FROM segment_users JOIN marketing_efforts ON segment_users.user_id = marketing_efforts.user_id
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, age FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT DISTINCT interests FROM users;
SELECT * FROM behaviors ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, target_behavior, start_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, age FROM users WHERE interests LIKE '%music%' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT u.name, b.behavior_type, b.timestamp FROM users u JOIN behaviors b ON u.id = b.user_id WHERE b.timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY b.timestamp DESC;

SELECT c.campaign_name, c.start_date, c.end_date, u.name as user_name, u.age FROM marketing_campaigns c JOIN users u ON c.target_behavior = u.interests WHERE u.age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY c.start_date ASC, u.age DESC;
SELECT u.name, COUNT(b.behavior_type) as behavior_count FROM users u LEFT JOIN behaviors b ON u.id = b.user_id GROUP BY u.name HAVING behavior_count > 1 ORDER BY behavior_count DESC, u.name ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM UserProfiles;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT interest_id, interest_name FROM Interests ORDER BY interest_name ASC;
SELECT behavior_id, behavior_name FROM Behaviors WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM UserProfiles WHERE user_id = 1;

SELECT UserProfiles.first_name, Interests.interest_name FROM UserProfiles JOIN UserInterests ON UserProfiles.user_id = UserInterests.user_id JOIN Interests ON UserInterests.interest_id = Interests.interest_id;
SELECT first_name, last_name, behavior_name FROM UserProfiles JOIN Behaviors ON UserProfiles.user_id = Behaviors.user_id;
SELECT DISTINCT first_name, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE interests IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM behavior WHERE behavior_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY behavior_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, age, gender FROM demographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE interests @> '["Technology"]';
SELECT u.username, b.behavior_type, b.behavior_timestamp FROM users u JOIN behavior b ON u.user_id = b.user_id;
SELECT d.age, d.gender, d.location, u.username FROM demographics d JOIN users u ON d.user_id = u.user_id WHERE d.age > 30;
SELECT u.username, c.campaign_name, c.start_date, c.end_date FROM users u JOIN user_segments s ON u.user_id = s.user_id JOIN marketing_campaigns c ON s.segment_name = 'VIP';
